title: High Quality of Utility Service Regulations
description: In 2024, Slovakia achieved a score of 91.74 in the quality of regulations on utility services, indicating a robust regulatory framework.

title: Efficient Utility Services
description: Slovakia scored 86.42 in overall utility services in 2024, showcasing its efficient utility infrastructure.

title: Long Duration of Secondary Education
description: In 2023, Slovakia's secondary education lasts for 9 years, reflecting a strong emphasis on extended education.

title: Balanced Income Distribution
description: With a Gini index of 24.1 in 2022, Slovakia demonstrates one of the most equitable income distributions globally.

title: High Male Employment in Industry
description: In 2023, 49.02% of male employment in Slovakia was in the industrial sector, indicating a strong industrial workforce.

title: Low Income Share of the Highest 10%
description: In 2022, the highest 10% income share in Slovakia was 18.2%, reflecting a relatively low concentration of wealth.

title: Minimal Customs and Import Duties
description: In 2022, customs and import duties in Slovakia were only 0.000135% of tax revenue, indicating minimal trade barriers.

title: Low Net ODA to Least Developed Countries
description: In 2022, Slovakia's net ODA to the least developed countries was 0.0006% of GNI, one of the lowest globally.

title: High Standard Error in Corruption Control
description: In 2023, Slovakia's standard error in corruption control was 0.145, indicating potential variability in corruption perceptions.
